title: Rainy night city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: A red car drives slowly on a rainy night in a city street with tall buildings and a large arched building on the corner.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (softRainNight). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 1.8 m/s). There are 22 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain and there are several other cars on the street. The traffic lights are visible in the distance and the pedestrians are walking on the sidewalk. The ego vehicle is moving slowly and carefully because of the rain and the potential for hidden obstacles.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to ensure safety on the rainy city streets. It is constantly monitoring the traffic situation and adjusting its speed and direction accordingly. The driver is being cautious and alert to avoid any potential accidents or collisions with other vehicles or pedestrians.
